text: Taisia Povaliy (also Taisia Povalij, Taisiya Povaliy) () (born 10 December 1964) is a Ukrainian singer and actress popular predominantly in Ukraine and Russia. Following the 2014 Ukrainian revolution Povaliy moved to Russia.Таїсія Повалій дасть перший з 2014 року концерт у Києві In 2015 Ukrainian parliament made a decree to remove her as Ukrainian National Singer because she does concerts in Russia. She started her career of singer in 1985. In 1993, she won the Grand Prix at the Slavianski Bazaar in Vitebsk, Belarus. Since then she had won many awards. In 1995, she released her first album./(website has automatic Google Translate option) Short bio, LIGA The next year she was awarded the honorary title of Merited Artist of Ukraine. In 1997, she was awarded the title of People's Artist of Ukraine. In 1998, she was awarded the Order of Saint Nicholas Thaumaturgus (International).Taisia Povaliy bio Povaliy was a candidate for Party of Regions at the October 2012 Ukrainian parliamentary election; placed second on the party listParty of Regions releases party list, Kyiv Post (30 July 2012) She was elected into parliament. Список депутатів нової Верховної Ради, Ukrayinska Pravda (11 November 2012) She left the Party of Regions parliamentarian faction on 3 June 2014.20 MPs leave Regions Party faction, Interfax-Ukraine (3 June 2014) Povaliy did not participate in the 2014 Ukrainian parliamentary election. Alphabetical Index of candidates in 2014 Ukrainian parliamentary election, Central Election Commission of Ukraine. ==Personal life== Son from her first marriage Denis Povaliy (born 28 June 1983). He studied at the Lyceum of Oriental Languages, graduated from the Kyiv Institute of International Relations of the National Taras Shevchenko University, singer. ==Work== ===Discography=== * 2010 – Верю Тебе (CD) * 2007 – За тобой – Таисия Повалий (CD)За тобой – Таисия Повалий * 2002 – Bude Tak (CD) * 2002 – (With Iosif Kobzon) Only One / Odna-edyna (DVD) ===Actor's work=== *Шорох крыльев – 1989 (drama) * Uranus, Уран – 1990 (drama) *Evenings on a Farm Near Dikanka, Вечера на хуторе близ Диканьки – 2001 (comedy, TV) * Cinderella, Золушка – 2002 (musical, TV, as Matchmakker) ==References== ==External links== *Taisia Povaliy website *International fan- club of Taisia Povaliy Category:1965 births Category:People from Skvyra Raion Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian female singers Category:Ukrainian television actresses Category:Ukrainian pop singers Category:Party of Regions politicians Category:20th-century Ukrainian actresses Category:21st-century Ukrainian actresses Category:Seventh convocation members of the Verkhovna Rada Category:Ukrainian pop-folk singers Category:Slavianski Bazaar winners
title: Taisia Povaliy
